docs.text: How to build this site This site is built with a combination of github pages and mkdocs-material. Prereqs Install python Install pip install mkdocs-material Setting up mkdocs.yml Building site mkdocs build cd ..\<page name> git add * git commit -a -m "<commit message>" git push
